name: Emergency Response Drills
description: Preparing for rapid and coordinated responses to national security incidents and disasters.

cards.title: Mass Casualty Incident Response
cards.description: Managing large-scale emergencies, including terrorist attacks and natural disasters.
bulletpoints: Coordinate with medical and law enforcement agencies
cards.summaryText: Command mass-casualty incidents by standing up triage lines fast, syncing medical and law enforcement assets, and executing prebuilt deployment plans under pressure.

cards.title: Active Shooter Response
cards.description: Strategies for neutralizing threats and securing civilians in mass attack scenarios.
bulletpoints: Implement ALERRT (Advanced Law Enforcement Rapid Response Training)
Coordinate tactical entry and hostage rescue operations
cards.summaryText: Neutralize active shooters by applying ALERRT tactics, locking down containment zones, and orchestrating coordinated entries that prioritize civilian extraction.
